content: As I stated earlier, first quarter revenue was up 23.8% to $788.3 million from 2021, while gross profit was up 27.6% to $128.3 million. Operating income in Q1 was $30.1 million, an increase of 113.4% or 3.8% of net sales compared to $14.1 million or 2.2% of net sales in the prior year quarter. In our Business Solutions segment, our Q1 net sales hit an all-time record of $320.4 million, an increase of 30.1% compared to $246.3 million, a year ago. Gross profit in the Business Solutions segment was $62.1 million, an increase of 31.2% from a year ago. In our Public Sector Solutions, business Q1 net sales were $132.5 million, an increase of 5.8% compared to $125.3 million, a year ago. Gross profit for the public sector segment was $17.3 million, an increase of 10.5% compared to Q1 2021. In our Enterprise Solutions segment, Q1 net sales were $335.4 million, an increase of 26.4% compared to $265.3 million, a year ago. Q1 operating income was $30.1 million, up 113.4% this quarter from $14.1 million a year ago. Net income for the quarter was $21.8 million, an increase of 114% from $10.2 million a year ago. Our trailing 12-month adjusted earnings before income taxes, depreciation and amortization or adjusted EBITDA was $129.1 million compared to $84.4 million a year ago, an increase of 53%.
